content.webTitle: Chelsea to face Swansea City in Capital One Cup semi-finals

fields.headline: Chelsea to face Swansea City in Capital One Cup semi-finals
fields.bodyText: Chelsea will face fellow Premier League side Swansea City in the semi-finals of the Capital One Cup after beating Leeds United 5-1 on Wednesday night. In the other tie, Bradford City, who beat Arsenal last week, will take on Aston Villa. The first legs of the matches are scheduled to take place in the week commencing 7 January, with the return fixtures to be played a fortnight later. For Rafael Benítez's side the match will be sandwiched between their visit to Southampton in the third round of the FA Cup on 5 January, and a trip to the Britannia Stadium to face Stoke City in the top flight seven days later.
